name: Movin' In!
description:
Movin' In is a relaxing home decorating game with life simulation aspects involved! Meet your new neighbors as you settle into your suite while gradually increasing the decoration value with new furniture and decor by receiving gifts and other things as you get closer to the others!

Created by Michelle Tu as the Narrative Designer, Vincent Liok as the Programmer, Nicole Polidore as the 3D artist, and Dylan Hollings as the Sound Designer and our resident CHEMIST. 

Note: The game is currently in an MVP state as we have built it in approximately 3 weeks with minimum time. Read more about future plans in the dev logs!

Check out the links to respective websites/work/profiles here!

Michelle Tu: https://michelles-worlds.notion.site/Michelle-Tu-68622a2fbb4141d988a37958c930873...
